嗼嗼嗼

嗼字的基本解释

嗼
mò
静，寂静：“饥马盈厩嗼然，未见刍也。”
喷嚏。

嗼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
同“寞1”。
寂寞，清静。

嗼字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页204第25
【唐韻】莫各切【集韻】末各切，?音莫。【說文】?嗼也。【玉篇】靜也。【爾雅·釋詁】嗼安，定也。【疏】詩皇矣云：求民之莫。鄭箋云：求民之定。嗼莫音義同。【呂氏春秋】饑馬盈廐，嗼然未見芻也。【楚辭·哀時命】嗼?默而無聲。　又【廣韻】鼽嚏也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?莫白切，音陌。【廣韻】詩云：盈盈一水閒，嗼嗼不得語。○按《文選》古詩作脈脈。　又【集韻】《博雅》安也。

嗼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嗼字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Wai
mò
Quiet, silent: "Hungry Ma Yingshou wailing, I haven't seen my husband."
sneeze.
Wai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mò］
Same as "Lonely 1".
Lonely and quiet.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗼; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 204-25
【Tang Yun】Move all cuts [Ji Yun] All cuts at the end,? Yin Mo. [Said the text]? [Jade articles] Quiet. 【Erya·Shiu】Ai'an, Dingye. 【Sparse】The Emperor of Poetry said: Seeking Mo for the people. Zheng Jianyun: Seek the people's decision. Ai Mo has the same sound and meaning. [Lu Shi Chun Qiu] Hungry Ma Yingli, but I didn't see Chu. [Songs of Chu·Wai Shi Ming] Ai? Silently and silently.　[Guangyun] sneezes too.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Mo Baiqie, Yinmo. [Guang Yun] Poetry: Yingying, leisurely, and speechless. ○According to the "Selected Works" ancient poems to make the veins.　[Jiyun] "Bo Ya" An Ye.
